amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection of Persons and Property
amendatorysection.para: (UDTA 15) (a) By accepting appointment as a trust director of a trust subject to the Nebraska Uniform Directed Trust Act, the director submits to personal jurisdiction of the courts of this state regarding any matter related to a power or duty of the director.
(b) This section does not preclude other methods of obtaining jurisdiction over a trust director.
